data.script:
<script>
    import {
        Animation,
        Button,
        Dot,
    } from "@kahi-ui/framework";

    let variation = undefined;
</script>

<Button
    on:click={() =>
        (variation =
            variation === "pause" ? "play" : "pause")}
>
    Toggle Variation
</Button>

<Animation animation="bounce" {variation}>
    <Dot palette="accent" />
</Animation>
data.title: Animation Variation
